pfFocused
directive in module patternfly

Description

The focus on element is evaluated from given expression. If the expression provided as an attribute to this directive is evaluated as true, the element is selected (and focused).

Usage

as attribute
<ANY pf-focused="{expression}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
pfFocused
(optional)
expression

If the expression is true, the element is focused and selected (if possible).
